physical_examinations.vital_signs: High fever and hypotension noted three days postoperatively.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Acute confusion developed three days after surgery, persistent confusion throughout 4-day ICU stay.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Confusion persisted throughout the ICU stay and cleared slowly as medical condition stabilized.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Delirium developed immediately postoperatively following ileostomy closure. The patient appeared confused and depressed.
